name: From me, the Moon
description:
Just you and your robot companion surveying our Moon.

Reflect on the decisions throughout your life in this interactive fiction game.

You only have 8 hours of oxygen left.

------------------------------------------------------

Use left-click or space bar to progress through the story.

----------------------------------------------

Insipired by:

From me, the Moon - Lav

Illustrations of Toni Demuro

------------------------------

Made using Unity & Fungus. 

Special thanks to Federico Fasce & Goldsmiths UoL.
